document_name: Energy Sources Regulations (conducting a survey to identify potential for energy conservation), 1993
document_url: https://cdn.climatepolicyradar.org/ISR/1993/ISR-1993-01-01-Energy Sources Regulations (conducting a survey to identify potential for energy conservation), 1993_7890eb513b434115b5387cfb24b14c06.pdf
document_description: The regulations instruct plants whose annual energy consumption is less than 2,000 tonne-equivalent fuel oil of other fuels or electricity, to perform every five years a study to find potential energy conservation measures and to update it annually until a new study is undertaken.
